title: Aston Villa v Fulham: Premier League – live
summary: Unai Emery's team is looking to regain form as they face Fulham in an upcoming match. Daniel Harris will provide a minute-by-minute report of the game. Fans are eager to see if Emery's side can secure a much-needed victory.

title: Starmer calls Reform’s policy on immigration ‘racist’ and says Farage’s party would ‘tear country apart’ – Labour conference live
summary: The Prime Minister criticized the Reform party's policy as immoral, but acknowledged that supporters of the party are not inherently racist; rather, they are frustrated. He emphasized the need to understand the motivations behind voters' choices. This statement highlights the complex dynamics of political support and public sentiment.

title: WSL clockwatch: Liverpool 0-2 Man Utd, Man City 4-1 London City and more – live
summary: Manchester United climbed to the top of the Women's Super League (WSL) table, leaving Liverpool without any points so far. Meanwhile, Michelle Agyemang scored for Brighton in their latest match. The standings reflect the growing competitive nature of the league.

title: The Billionaire Inside Your Head review – OCD and capitalism collide in daring office drama
summary: Will Lord's new play introduces a neurodiverse perspective to a competitive narrative reminiscent of David Mamet, focusing on the intense rivalry between ambitious debt collectors. The storyline explores the complexities of their pursuit of financial success. This fresh viewpoint adds depth to the traditional themes of ambition and conflict in the world of finance.

title: Ryder Cup MC apologises and steps down over foul-mouthed McIlroy chant
summary: The comedian hired to warm up the crowd at the Ryder Cup has issued an apology and resigned from her position. Her departure comes before the final day of the event. The reasons for her decision have not been disclosed.
